thread.title: Time to go visit Eclat -
thread.title_full: Time to go visit Eclat - Review of Hotel Eclat Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: ChinChen123
title: Time to go visit Eclat -
text: This hotel is one of the best location hotel in China,the arts here are very unique,the staff here are kindly and nice,I met Manager Chris and I told him I will more than happy to recommend eclat to my other colleagues if the breakfast can have more options.but generally is was great stay.
